description: This is a Dart source file implementing a Flutter widget for the home screen of a mobile app. It constructs a UI with a vintage background, search bar, discover banner, and trending books list.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the app's home screen with a vintage aesthetic, featuring search, discover, and trending sections.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, composing various UI components.
